title: Need to know what font this is
content:
Does anyone know what font this is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112533/http:/typophile.com/files/font_91.jpg) | 5.26 KB |

 [‹ Font ID: Henri Matisse Traits Essentiels typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112533/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44853 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Parowan Chamber of Commerce script-like display face - Sprint {Mike F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828112533/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44807 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jlinas

comments.content:
It’s a Baskerville, probably ITC New Baskerville.

- Lex
